ygData.subject: Re: Massive Changes to Trade System?
ygData.msgSnippet: Then again, they may make trade skills harder to learn.... ... From: Ed Coyle  I saw this post on Stratics this morning: A massive
ygData.messageBody:
Then again, they may make trade skills harder to learn....

>>> "Ed Coyle" <ecoyle@...> 5.17.99 12:23:39 PM >>>
From: "Ed Coyle" <ecoyle@...>

I saw this post on Stratics this morning:

A massive revision to trade skills and the manners in which
they function will be implemented through an important patch
to be released approximately 2 months from now.

Does anyone know what they are planning? Any rumors?

My Blacksmith skill is right around 24 right now, and I am not sure if I
should develop it any further, spending a ton of plat, if they plan on
changing the system drastically.

Etuen - 18th Wizard
